description.ko: FLORA-9은 유기적 생명체와 디지털 건축의 융합을 나타내며, 데이터가 수액처럼 흐르는 가상 생태계 내에서 진화한 지능형 식물 종을 보여줍니다.
description.en: FLORA-9 represents the fusion of organic life and digital architecture, showcasing a sentient plant species evolved within a virtual ecosystem where data flows like sap.

prompt: A high-tech cybernetic flower with translucent petals glowing in bioluminescent cyan and magenta, intricate fiber-optic veins, set in a dark digital forest with floating data particles and glitch effects, ultra-realistic, 8k, cinematic lighting, futuristic aesthetic.
